attributes.additional_details:
The original Act was voted on the published basis that 'essential sovereignty' would not be affected.
This has been abundantly transgressed in the further acts/treaties ; all of which were passed on Royal assent and without referenda or other recourse to the population. 
The Single Market Act
The Maastricht Treaty
The Amsterdam Treaty
The Treaty of Nice
The Lisbon Treaty
attributes.background:
The original Act was voted on the published basis that 'essential sovereignty' would not be affected.
This has been abundantly transgressed in the further acts/treaties ; all of which were passed on Royal assent and without referenda or other recourse to the population.
